This Express Service operates on the dates of all Dodger home games, departing from Harbor Gateway Transit Center Bay #9 and running up the Harbor Transitway to Dodger Stadium, beginning 2 Hours before game time and continuing until 45 minutes after the game ends. This is a free service to anyone with a ticket to the game.

This Express Service operates on the dates of all Dodger home games, departing from the West Portal of Historic Union Station and running directly to Dodger Stadium, beginning 90 minutes before game time and continuing until 45 minutes after the game ends. This is a free service to anyone with a ticket to the game. Due to other activities, initially trips will be leaving from Patsaouras Plaza, returning to the West Portal on May 11th, 2021
